title: Agasatha Lyrics Cuckoo Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Agasatha 
Singer(s): Kalyani Nair, Pradeep Kumar
Lyricist: Yuga Bharathi
Music: Santhosh Narayanan
Movie: Cuckoo (2014)

Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren.
Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren.

Kannaala edhayum kaanaadha
imaithaan kanneera paarthaeney.
Ini ennoda azhaga
ponnaana azhaga unnaala paarpeney.

Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren
Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren

Ooru kanne padumpadi
uravaadum kanave thoduradhu.
Nenavaagum kanave arugile
unna thooki somapen karuvile.
Madi vaasam podhum urangave
nee thaaney saaga varangale.

Tamizhe tamizhe varuveney
un karamaa.
Kodiye kodiye azhareney
aanandhamaa.

Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren
Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren

Kaamba thaedum kozhandhaya
unna thaedum usuru pasiyila.
kodi peril unna mattum
ariveney thodugira mozhiyila.

Peranbu pola yedhumilla
nee podhum naanum inaiyilla.
Azhaga azhaga Kuyilaaven un thozhil
azhagi azhagi idhu podhum  vazhnaalil

Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren
Agasatha Naan paakuren
aaru kadal naan paaakkuren.

Kannaala edhayum kaanaadha
imaithaan kanneera paarthaeney.
Ini ennoda azhaga
ponnaana azhaga unnaala paarpeney.
